title: What is Gunz (GUN)?
body: GUNZ is a blockchain-based platform integrated into traditional gaming formats, enabling players to convert in-game items into NFTs (non-fungible tokens) if they choose to do so. Bitfinex is one of the first global exchanges to list the GUN token. Unlike typical free-to-play games where purchased or earned items remain locked within the game ecosystem, GUNZ gives players actual ownership of digital assets, meaning these items can be traded, kept, or sold on the in-game marketplace or other compatible platforms. This approach aims to provide more flexibility and control to users over the digital goods they earn during gameplay. The platform is currently featured in two games: Off The Grid (OTG), a cyberpunk-themed extraction battle royale available on PC and consoles, and Technocore , a mobile game focused on navigating a drone through complex environments while collecting loot. Players in both titles can find loot boxes known as HEXes, which, if successfully extracted, can be converted into NFTs. This mechanism links gameplay achievements with blockchain-based ownership, distinguishing GUNZ from traditional loot or cosmetic systems. Trade Gun Now What is the GUN Token? The GUN token is the native digital currency of the GUNZ gaming platform, designed to support a decentralized economy within participating games such as Off The Grid and Technocore . It serves as both a utility and reward token, enabling players to trade, purchase, and unlock in-game items and features. Unlike traditional game currencies that are confined to a single game or controlled entirely by a central authority, GUN operates on a blockchain, giving players verifiable ownership of the tokens they earn or purchase. Within the GUNZ ecosystem, GUN tokens are primarily used to facilitate transactions on the in-game marketplace, where players can buy, sell, or trade items that have been tokenized as NFTs. These items can range from weapons and cosmetic upgrades to character enhancements and hideout features. This decentralized model means players can extract real-world value from their in-game progress by exchanging digital assets in a transparent and secure environment. trade gun now GUN is also tied to gameplay incentives. Players earn tokens by completing various challenges or objectives during matches, such as ranking highly in the game, extracting loot, or using specific gear effectively. This system encourages active participation and skill development, rewarding players not only with in-game progression but with tradable digital assets. These tokens can then be reinvested into the game or held as a form of value, depending on the user‚Äôs preferences. Importantly, the GUN token is optional for players who prefer a more traditional gaming experience. Players can enjoy GUNZ-powered games without engaging in the token economy, as all core gameplay features remain accessible without the use of GUN. However, for those interested in digital ownership, trading, or earning through play, the GUN token introduces a new layer of engagement, merging traditional gaming with the emerging world of decentralized digital economies. GUN Tokenomics The GUN token, native to the GUNZ gaming ecosystem, has a fixed maximum supply of 10 billion tokens, ensuring a clear cap on issuance. At the time of its listing, the initial circulating supply will stand at approximately 604.5 million GUN, representing 6.05% of the total supply. As part of its public launch, 400 million GUN tokens (4% of the total supply) have been allocated as rewards through Binance‚Äôs Launchpool, allowing users to farm GUN by staking BNB, FDUSD, or USDC . This initiative incentivizes early adoption and liquidity participation across three supported pools, with 80% of rewards designated to the BNB pool and the remaining 20% evenly split between FDUSD and USDC. Full tokenomics details, including smart contract information, are expected to be made publicly available at launch. How to buy GUN with crypto 1. Log in to your Bitfinex account or sign up to create one. 2. Go to the Deposit page . 3. In the Cryptocurrencies section, choose the crypto you plan to buy GUN with and generate a deposit address on the Exchange wallet. 4. Send the crypto to the generated deposit address. 5. Once the funds arrive in your wallet, you can trade them for GUN. Learn how to trade on Bitfinex here . How to buy GUN with fiat 1. Log in to your Bitfinex account or sign up to create one. 2. You need to get full verification to be able to deposit fiat to your Bitfinex account. Learn about different verification levels here . 3. On the Deposit page , under the Bank Wire menu, choose the fiat currency of your deposit. There‚Äôs a minimum amount for fiat deposits on Bitfinex; learn more here . 4. Check your Bitfinex registered email for the wire details. 5. Send the funds. 6. Once the funds arrive in your wallet, you can use them to buy GUN. Also, we have Bitfinex on mobile, so you can easily buy GUN currency while on-the-go. [ AppStore ] [ Google Play ] GUN Community Channels Website | X (Twitter) | Discord The post What is Gunz (GUN)? appeared first on Bitfinex blog .

title: Arctic Pablo Coin‚Äôs Explosive Presale Surge‚ÄîAnalysts Predict $0.10 Soon ‚Äì The Best Meme Coin for Exponential Returns, As Neiro and COQ Inu Shines
body: In a world where digital currencies are rapidly transforming the financial world, meme coins are grabbing attention like never before. title: Coinbase asks DC Court to revive lawsuit against FDIC
body: Coinbase, one of the leading cryptocurrency exchanges in the U.S., has a motion pending in front of the D.C. District Court to reinstate its Freedom of Information Act‚ÄÇlawsuit against government agency, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) The‚ÄÇexchange says the FDIC is still withholding some important documents and not fully cooperating with requests for information. The lawsuit seeks to force the FDIC to hand over records of its conversations with banks related to cryptocurrency actions, including the ‚Äòpause letters‚Äô issued to banks telling them to stop providing‚ÄÇcrypto services.‚Äù Coinbase seeks court‚Äôs intervention as FDIC cooperation falters in Operation Choke Point 2.0 dispute Coinbase has been involved in a¬†months-long battle¬†with the FDIC. The firm has been pursuing the FDIC over Operation Choke Point 2.0 for months now and has achieved impressive results. Despite this, Coinbase is asking the DC District Court to resume its litigation against the regulator. The legal action was initially paused in February 2025 after President Trump appointed Travis Hill as acting FDIC chairman. Hill vowed to enhance the agency‚Äôs transparency beyond FOIA requirements, raising hopes that the matter could be resolved outside of court. Still, Coinbase‚Äôs Chief Legal Officer, Paul Grewal, says there is ongoing dissatisfaction with the FDIC‚Äôs transparency. He acknowledges that cooperation has improved under the new leadership but feels it is still not enough. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre asking the Court to resume our lawsuit because the FDIC has unfortunately stopped sharing information. While we would have loved to resolve this outside of the legal system ‚Äì and we do appreciate the increased cooperation we‚Äôve seen from the new FDIC leadership ‚Äì we still have a ways to go,‚Äù¬†claimed¬†Paul Grewal, Coinbase‚Äôs Chief Legal Officer. As a key US financial regulator overseeing banks, the FDIC played a central role in Operation Choke Point 2.0, restricting banks‚Äô interactions with cryptocurrency businesses. However, it recently began a pro-crypto turn, releasing relevant documents and revoking several of its anti-crypto regulations. Grewal says that he ‚Äúappreciated the increased cooperation‚Äù from the FDIC. However, he noted that the cooperation had stopped weeks ago. According to Coinbase‚Äôs filing , the FDIC hasn‚Äôt sent any new information since late February and claimed in early March that the exchange‚Äôs subsequent requests were ‚Äúunreasonable and beyond the scope of discovery.‚Äù The FDIC is expected to respond to¬†Coinbase‚Äôs¬†motion within two weeks. Coinbase pushes for court action as FDIC‚Äôs overreach could alter the future of crypto innovation Operation Choke Point 2.0 is the term used for a series of actions allegedly taken by certain federal regulators and agencies, including the FDIC, to limit banking access to certain high-risk or controversial industries, including cryptocurrency businesses. Critics say this is a subtle ploy to kill the crypto space by denying exchanges, brokerages, and other players‚ÄÇin the ecosystem access to traditional banking services. Coinbase contends that actions taken, especially through informal guidance and informal pressure on banks, have launched a hostile environment for‚ÄÇcryptocurrency businesses under the FDIC. These operations resulted in an illegal restriction on access to banking services, which placed cryptographic firms in a‚ÄÇrelatively disadvantaged position in the financial arena. As part of its effort to revive the case,‚ÄÇCoinbase is seeking court intervention to compel the FDIC to answer and prevent such overreach in the future. Coinbase argues that such overreach chills innovation in the digital assets market. The FDIC‚Äôs actions, they argue, violate both due process and the First Amendment, as cryptocurrency companies believe they should not be penalized based on what business they choose to operate. If Coinbase is‚ÄÇsuccessful in reviving its lawsuit, the implications could be sweeping for both the cryptocurrency industry and the regulatory agencies. title: XRP Faces Regulatory Pressure, TAO Hits $757‚ÄîBut BlockDAG‚Äôs Keynote 3 Focuses on Long-Term Infrastructure
body: Blockchain‚Äôs use cases have widened‚Äîfrom digital payments to artificial intelligence‚Äîbut the conversation is now shifting toward long-term infrastructure. XRP has focused on cross-border remittances, while Bittensor has introduced a decentralized approach to AI training. BlockDAG , however, is taking a broader view. Its roadmap includes decentralized identity, AI integration, and token-holder governance‚Äîbuilt on its DAG-based hybrid architecture. With a $209.5 million presale and a 2,380% return from Batch 1 to Batch 27, BlockDAG is framing itself not just as a project, but as a platform designed to support the next phase of the Web3 ecosystem. XRP‚Äôs Role in Global Payments & Its Investment Track Record Ripple Labs launched XRP in 2012 to streamline international payments. It was built to provide fast, low-cost transaction processing for banks and financial institutions, specifically through real-time gross settlement and remittance networks. At launch, XRP traded for fractions of a cent. Today, as of March 28, 2025, it is priced around $2.32. Its journey has been marked by market shifts and, more significantly, legal scrutiny. The SEC lawsuit initiated in 2020 has had a lasting impact on XRP‚Äôs price and market standing. Despite those legal headwinds, XRP continues to hold a major market position. It remains one of the top digital assets by market capitalization, with growing adoption among banks and payment providers worldwide. This suggests that, despite its challenges, XRP has maintained long-term utility in global finance. Bittensor (TAO): Decentralized AI & Notable Price Movement Bittensor‚Äôs TAO token went live on March 6, 2023, at an initial price of $93.40. The network aims to decentralize artificial intelligence by enabling participants to contribute computing resources and algorithms to a shared ecosystem. The goal is to create an open, collaborative AI marketplace. TAO saw sharp price movements following launch. It peaked at $757.60 in December 2023 before settling at around $479.85 by January 29, 2025. These figures show significant investor returns from the starting price, even amid the typical volatility of crypto markets. What makes Bittensor stand out is its blend of AI and blockchain. This intersection has attracted attention from developers and investors alike. As more industries explore decentralized AI models, TAO‚Äôs role as an early mover could prove significant in shaping this new segment of the crypto economy. BlockDAG‚Äôs Future-Focused Roadmap: From AI to Digital Identity As blockchain evolves, the focus is moving away from simple transaction speeds and toward building meaningful infrastructure. BlockDAG is aligning itself with this shift‚Äîby preparing for a digital future that includes AI, self-managed identity, and decentralized governance. Features like account abstraction, zero-knowledge cryptography, and smart contract flexibility are core to its architecture‚Äîsetting the stage for identity solutions, AI agents, and programmable governance. This means users could one day control their digital identity securely without third-party oversight, or engage with autonomous AI systems for everyday tasks. Governance could evolve beyond voting apps into smart, code-driven policy-making tools‚Äîgiving token holders real influence. These aren‚Äôt speculative ideas. They‚Äôre technical possibilities being built into the foundation today. With Testnet already in motion and Mainnet on the horizon, BlockDAG‚Äôs ecosystem is actively preparing for these applications‚Äînot years from now, but in the near term. Key Insights! title: Bitcoin Whales Accumulate as Short-Term Holders Capitulate‚ÄîWhat This Mean for BTC
body: Bitcoin has continued to show weakness in price movement, with limited upside momentum over the past several weeks. The cryptocurrency has declined by 22.3% in the last month alone, bringing its price down to $83,191 at the time of writing. The drop reflects ongoing uncertainty in the broader crypto market, as investors are struggling with reduced risk appetite and a lack of strong bullish catalysts. Related Reading: Bitcoin RSI Targets Daily Retest That Triggered 2024 Price Rally, What Happened Last Time Whale Accumulation Patterns Echo Previous Bull Market Phases Despite the downtrend, recent on-chain activity suggests that certain investor cohorts remain confident in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value. In particular, whale addresses‚Äîwallets holding between 1,000 and 10,000 BTC‚Äîhave demonstrated a historical correlation with Bitcoin‚Äôs price trends. According to CryptoQuant contributor Mignolet, the current market cycle bears a resemblance to the 2020 bull cycle, where these whales exhibited accumulation behavior during bearish sentiment phases. Mignolet noted that these patterns occurred three times throughout the 2020 cycle, each coinciding with brief drawdowns in price. In the current phase, similar accumulation activity is being observed among whale entities, particularly those with holdings in the 1,000 to 10,000 BTC range. These patterns, as Mignolet suggests, may indicate that these market leaders are not exiting their positions, despite price pressure. Notably, the significance of whale behavior lies in its historical influence on market direction. As long as whales remain in accumulation mode, it could provide a base of support for the broader market and reduce the likelihood of further rapid declines. However, this dynamic does not eliminate the possibility of continued volatility, especially if broader market sentiment does not improve. Bitcoin Short-Term Holders Show Signs of Capitulation In contrast to whale activity, short-term holders (STHs) are showing signs of distress. Another CryptoQuant analyst, Darkfost, highlighted that the Short-Term Holder Spent Output Profit Ratio (SOPR) has remained below 1.0 for over two months, currently hovering around 0.98. This metric compares the selling price of Bitcoin with its acquisition price. When it falls below 1, it suggests that holders are selling at a loss‚Äîoften viewed as a sign of capitulation. STH Capitulation ‚ÄúWhen this ratio drops below 1, it signals capitulation among STHs, often leading to short-term price declines. We can confirm this trend by observing the $BTC being sent to exchanges at a loss.‚Äù ‚Äì By @Darkfost_Coc Link ‚§µÔ∏èhttps://t.co/BUIo9caGck pic.twitter.com/QfNfFpT9VL ‚Äî CryptoQuant.com (@cryptoquant_com) March 31, 2025 Additionally, on-chain data shows that approximately 46,000 BTC have been sent to exchanges at a loss in recent weeks, highlighting the stress among STHs. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Slips Under $84,000 ‚Äî Key Support Levels To Watch Historically, periods of heavy short-term capitulation have often preceded market bottoms, as weak hands exit positions and longer-term investors take advantage of the discounts. Featured image created with DALL-E, Chart from TradingView

title: Keynote 3 Reveals BlockDAG‚Äôs Uptime Power While Helium Drops to $3.37 & Raydium Feels $12B Pressure

With fault-tolerant design and seamless availability, it‚Äôs giving users and developers a dependable place to build‚Äîand that‚Äôs translating directly into presale success and growing momentum. Helium‚Äôs Wireless Vision Shows Promise Helium began its journey in 2012, founded by Amir Haleem, Shawn Fanning, and Sean Carey. It officially launched its mainnet in 2019, aiming to create a fully decentralized network for IoT devices. The idea was bold: reward users for setting up hotspots to expand wireless coverage. Then came Helium Mobile in May 2023, offering unlimited talk, text, and data for just $20 a month. That move paid off‚Äîby December 2023, Helium Mobile made up roughly 90% of Helium‚Äôs entire network revenue. The token story, however, has been a rollercoaster. In Q3 2024, HNT‚Äôs circulating market cap surged 124% from the previous quarter to $1.3 billion, while its price jumped 119% to $7.54. But as of March 28, 2025, HNT has fallen back to $3.37‚Äîa steep 93.1% drop from its peak of $48.80. Despite this, Helium‚Äôs ecosystem is expanding globally, boosted by fresh partnerships and international moves. Still, the volatility leaves questions around its long-term reliability. Raydium Surges on Solana‚ÄîBut Faces the Heat of Big Volume Raydium entered the market in early 2021 and quickly carved out space as a go-to DEX on Solana. Thanks to Solana‚Äôs speed and low fees, Raydium attracted users fast‚Äîhandling between $1 and $2 billion in weekly trading volume by early 2024. Then came a massive spike: $12 billion in a single week later that year, underscoring its explosive growth. As of March 28, 2025, Raydium‚Äôs RAY token is priced at $2.00. Daily trading volume stands at roughly $56.99 million, and its market cap is around $581.66 million. With control of 60.7% of Solana‚Äôs DEX market, Raydium has certainly proven its strength in DeFi. But even with liquidity and development on its side, keeping pace with growing expectations is no small task. BlockDAG‚Äôs Secret Weapon? Always-On Infrastructure That Won‚Äôt Let You Down What‚Äôs driving the buzz around BlockDAG? It‚Äôs not just the gains‚Äîit‚Äôs the rock-solid foundation underneath. While other platforms face outages and pressure during high demand, BlockDAG is built to stay live no matter what. Its fault-tolerant design ensures that even if nodes or regions fail, the network keeps moving. This is no accident. BlockDAG‚Äôs global architecture spreads across multiple data centers, rerouting traffic instantly when needed. That means no bottlenecks, no panic, and no interruptions for users or developers. It‚Äôs smart, stable, and ahead of the curve. And it‚Äôs working. BlockDAG has already raised $209.5 million during its presale. With over 18.9 billion coins sold and batch 27 priced at $0.0248, the return from batch 1 stands at a jaw-dropping 2,380%. That kind of growth doesn‚Äôt come from hype alone‚Äîit comes from confidence. This isn‚Äôt just about having a strong system. It‚Äôs about showing users they can trust it to be there tomorrow, next year, and beyond. And in crypto, that kind of trust is rare‚Äîand valuable. Why BlockDAG‚Äôs Resilience Could Be the Edge Every Developer Wants Every blockchain wants to promise big returns, but only a few can guarantee stability. Helium has the vision, and Raydium brings liquidity‚Äîbut both face pressure to maintain uptime and confidence. BlockDAG, on the other hand, has made reliability part of its DNA. Its infrastructure is built to handle pressure without flinching, and that‚Äôs exactly what developers and buyers are looking for. The presale numbers already prove it, but the real story is in the long game. As more projects look to build without disruption, BlockDAG‚Äôs fault tolerance becomes more than just a feature‚Äîit becomes a reason to choose it over others. And with this level of performance and investor backing, it‚Äôs clear: BlockDAG isn‚Äôt just ready for what‚Äôs next‚Äîit‚Äôs already building it. title: Coinbase CEO calls for change in stablecoin laws to enable ‚Äòonchain interest‚Äô
body: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong is calling for legislative changes in the US to allow stablecoin holders to earn ‚Äúonchain interest‚Äù on their holdings. In a March 31 post on X, Armstrong argued that crypto companies should be treated similarly to banks and be ‚Äúallowed to, and incentivized to, share interest with consumers.‚Äù He added that allowing onchain interest would be ‚Äúconsistent with a free market approach.‚Äù Source: Brian Armstrong There are currently two competing pieces of federal stablecoin legislation working their way through the legislative process in the US: the Stablecoin Transparency and Accountability for a Better Ledger Economy (STABLE) Act, and the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins (GENIUS) Act. In reference to the stablecoin legislation, Armstrong said the US had an opportunity to ‚Äúlevel the playing field and ensure these laws pave a way for all regulated stablecoins to deliver interest directly to consumers, the same way a savings or checking account can.‚Äù Armstrong: Onchain interest a boon for US economy Armstrong argued that while stablecoins have already found product-market fit by ‚Äúdigitizing the dollar and other fiat currencies,‚Äù the addition of onchain interest would allow ‚Äúthe average person, and the US economy, to reap the full benefits.‚Äù He said that if legislative changes allowed stablecoin issuers to pay interest to holders, US consumers could earn a yield of around 4% on their holdings, far outstripping the 2024 average interest yield on a consumer savings account, which Armstrong cited as 0.41%. Armstrong also said onchain interest could benefit the broader US economy ‚Äî by incentivizing the global use of US dollar stablecoins. This could see their use grow, ‚Äúpulling dollars back to U.S. treasuries and extending dollar dominance in an increasingly digital global economy,‚Äù according to the Coinbase CEO. He also argued that the potential for a higher yield than traditional savings accounts would result in ‚Äúmore yield in consumers‚Äô hands means more spending, saving, investing ‚Äî fueling economic growth in all local economies where stablecoins are held.‚Äù ‚ÄúIf we don‚Äôt unlock onchain interest, the U.S. misses out on billions more USD users and trillions in potential cash flows,‚Äù Armstrong added. Currently, neither the STABLE Act nor the GENIUS Act gives the legal go-ahead for onchain interest-generating stablecoins. In fact, in its current form, the STABLE Act includes a short passage prohibiting ‚Äúpayment stablecoin‚Äù issuers from paying yield to holders: Source: STABLE Act Related: Stablecoins, tokenized assets gain as Trump tariffs loom Similarly, the GENIUS Act, which recently passed the Senate Banking Committee by a vote of 18-6, has been amended to exclude interest-bearing instruments from its definition of a ‚Äúpayment stablecoin.‚Äù Commenting on the current state of the STABLE Act, Representative Bryan Steil told Eleanor Terrett, host of the Crypto in America podcast, that two pieces of legislation are positioned to ‚Äúmirror up‚Äù following a few more draft rounds in the House and Senate ‚Äî due to the differences between them being textual rather than substantive. ‚ÄúAt the end of the day, I think there‚Äôs recognition that we want to work with our Senate colleagues to get this across the line,‚Äù Steil said. Magazine: SEC‚Äôs U-turn on crypto leaves key questions unanswered

title: South Korean Crypto Traders ‚ÄòDuped into Joining Money Laundering Scams‚Äô
body: Fraudsters are targeting South Korean crypto traders with sophisticated scams that help criminals launder money, police claim. Per a report from the South Korean media outlet CBS NoCut News , scammers are luring crypto wallet holders with offers of ‚Äúpart-time‚Äù crypto trading ‚Äújobs.‚Äù South Korean Crypto Traders: Money Launderers Post ‚ÄòPart-time Job Ads‚Äô The media outlet wrote that officers are dealing with a ‚Äúseries of cases‚Äù that involve ‚Äúvoice phishing organizations‚Äù that ‚Äúabuse‚Äù crypto to ‚Äúlaunder criminal funds.‚Äù Busan Saha Police Station in Busan, South Korea. (Source: hyolee2 [CC BY-SA 3.0]) Police in Busan, South Korea‚Äôs second city, gave the example of an unnamed man (referred to as ‚ÄúA‚Äù) aged in his 20s. A, officers, arrived at a police station in Busan with a lawyer, ‚Äúclaiming that he had been involved in a voice phishing crime‚Äù while ‚Äúworking part-time.‚Äù A told the police that he had responded to a ‚Äúpart-time work advertisement on Instagram‚Äù calling for people with crypto wallets.‚Äù The trader said that he responded to the posting ‚Äúout of curiosity.‚Äù A explained that a ‚Äúcompany‚Äù then ‚Äúimmediately hired him‚Äù and ‚Äúinstructed him to buy cryptoassets on their behalf.‚Äù The company did not conduct any ‚Äúface-to-face interviews,‚Äù police said, and ‚Äúall work-related conversations were conducted strictly on the Telegram chat app.‚Äù South Korea‚Äôs financial authorities tighten AML controls to address new money laundering risks in the crypto sector. #SouthKorea #CryptoLaws https://t.co/2BlRNYWfxR ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) March 5, 2025 Crypto Wallet Suspended A said he thought he had been hired to work as as ‚Äúcryptocurrency purchasing agent.‚Äù He explained how he used his own crypto wallets to make purchases for the company ‚Äúfor a few days.‚Äù However, he began to suspect something was amiss when his ‚Äúaccount was suddenly suspended.‚Äù A said that he had been ‚Äúsurprised‚Äù by the suspension and then began to look into the matter. The trader insisted he thought he was working for a bona fide company. He added that the person who ‚Äúhired‚Äù him had shown A realistic-looking ‚Äúdocuments.‚Äù He explained: ‚ÄúAt first I had no idea this firm was related to criminal activities.‚Äù A said he had executed some 300 million won ($204,415) worth of trades for the company in a week. Firefighters rescued from temple bathhouse as wildfire engulfs 1,000-year-old temple https://t.co/WQ2vIFl8Ak ‚Äî The Korea Times (@koreatimescokr) March 31, 2025 Fraudsters Use Overseas Exchanges, Say Officers Police officers think that the trader took money from the ‚Äúcompany.‚Äù A then allegedly used the funds to buy crypto, sending the coins onto the alleged criminals‚Äô crypto wallets. This money, officers say, was ‚Äúlaundered money‚Äù raised from ‚Äúvoice phishing schemes.‚Äù Officers said they have pressed charges against A, but added they were still ‚Äúinvestigating the exact circumstances‚Äù of the case. Police said that they were now dealing with a rising number of similar cases, which mainly appear to ‚Äútarget people in their 20s and 30s.‚Äù Criminals, officers added, ‚Äúrecruit‚Äù victims by ‚Äúposting advertisements‚Äù for ‚Äúhigh-paying part-time jobs‚Äù and ‚Äúcrypto purchasing agents‚Äù on social media platforms such as Instagram and Telegram open chat rooms. South Korea‚Äôs interim leader Han Duck-soo faces the threat of yet another impeachment proceeding as the Constitutional Court drags out its deliberations on President Yoon Suk Yeol‚Äôs political fate. https://t.co/nx1thA2sqt ‚Äî Bloomberg (@business) March 31, 2025 Typically, officers said, criminals offer to give ‚Äúapplicants‚Äù between 2% and 3% of each trade‚Äôs worth ‚Äúas a commission fee.‚Äù The organizations instruct traders to conduct crypto transactions on overseas-based crypto exchanges . They then tell ‚Äúagents‚Äù to send coins to crypto wallets, which are also similarly ‚Äúlocated overseas.‚Äù This process eventually makes it ‚Äúdifficult‚Äù for investigators to ‚Äútrace‚Äù the flow of funds. Gwanganli Beach, Busan, South Korea. (Source: Carey Ciuro [CC BY 2.0]) A spokesperson from Saha Police Station in Busan explained: ‚ÄúVoice phishing scams that make use of crypto have existed for a while. However, recently, we have recently seen a rise in this new type of crime. It is difficult for us to monitor funds on overseas exchanges or wallets, because their operators do not always fully cooperate with our investigations.‚Äù The spokesperson warned that even in cases where crypto-keen citizens are ‚Äúunaware‚Äù they are working with money launderers and other fraudsters, legal risks are high. The official concluded: ‚ÄúCitizens could be prosecuted for aiding and abetting fraud in these cases, so we urge caution.‚Äù The post South Korean Crypto Traders ‚ÄòDuped into Joining Money Laundering Scams‚Äô appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: SIR.trading begs hacker to return $255K or ‚Äòno chance for us to survive‚Äô
body: The founder of the recently hacked decentralized finance protocol SIR.trading has made an emotional plea to the attacker, asking them to return around 70% of the stolen customer funds otherwise, the protocol will not survive. ‚ÄúHere is my proposal, keep $100k as a fair share for your critical bug find, and return the remaining,‚Äù SIR.trading‚Äôs pseudonymous founder ‚ÄúXatarrer‚Äù wrote in a March 31 onchain message to the attacker following the $355,000 hack on March 30. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll call it even. No legal games, no drama,‚Äù they added. Xatarrer said that SIR.trading was built on the back of four years of late-night coding and $70,000 from friends and believers without any additional venture capital funding. ‚ÄúWe grew to $400k TVL organically without any advertising. If you keep 100% of the funds, there is no chance for us to survive.‚Äù Xatarrer even praised the hacker for the sophisticated hack, stating that it was ‚Äúalmost beautiful if it wasn‚Äôt for all the funds people lost.‚Äù Source: SIR.trading The hacker hasn‚Äôt responded and has already transferred the stolen funds through to Ethereum privacy solution Railgun, according to data from Ethereum block explorer Etherscan. Xatarrer initially said on March 30 that the SIR.trading team intended to keep the protocol up and running despite the setback. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve already started planning our next steps. Those impacted by the hack will not be forgotten,‚Äù it said on March 31. Hack resulted from feature added to Ethereum‚Äôs Dencun upgrade The hacker targeted a callback function used in the protocol‚Äôs ‚Äúvulnerable contract Vault‚Äù which leverages Ethereum‚Äôs transient storage feature. The hacker managed to replace the real Uniswap pool address used in this callback function with an address under the hacker‚Äôs control, allowing them to redirect the funds in the vault to their address by repeatedly calling the callback function until all of the protocol‚Äôs total value locked was drained. The transient storage feature was added to Ethereum in the March 2024 Dencun upgrade as a solution to offer users lower gas fees than gas typically required for regular storage. Related: DeFi hacks drop 40% in 2024, CeFi breaches surge to $694M ‚Äî Hacken SIR.trading‚Äôs documentation shows that it was billed as ‚Äúa new DeFi protocol for safer leverage‚Äù to address some of the challenges that often occur in leveraged trading ‚Äî such as volatility decay and liquidation risks. It comes as crypto lost to exploits and scams fell to $28.8M in March, blockchain security firm CertiK said in a March 31 X post. Around $4.8 million was subtracted from that figure after hackers involved in the 1inch Resolver incident returned the stolen funds. Crypto exploits and scams had one of its worst months in February, headlined by the $1.4 billion Bybit hack. Magazine: Should crypto projects ever negotiate with hackers? Probably

title: zkLend hacker claims losing stolen ETH to Tornado Cash phishing site
body: The hacker behind the $9.6 million exploit of the decentralized money-lending protocol zkLend in February claims they‚Äôve just fallen victim to a phishing website impersonating Tornado Cash, resulting in the loss of a significant portion of the stolen funds. In a message sent to zkLend through Etherscan on March 31, the hacker claimed to have lost 2,930 Ether ( ETH ) from the stolen funds to a phishing website posing as a front-end for Tornado Cash. In a series of March 31 transfers, the zkLend thief sent 100 Ether at a time to an address named Tornado.Cash: Router, finishing with three deposits of 10 Ether. ‚ÄúHello, I tried to move funds to a Tornado, but I used a phishing website, and all the funds have been lost. I am devastated. I am terribly sorry for all the havoc and losses caused,‚Äù the hacker said. The hacker behind the zkLend exploit claims to have lost most of the funds to a phishing website posing as a front-end for Tornado Cash. Source: Etherscan ‚ÄúAll the 2,930 Eth have been taken by that site owners. I do not have coins. Please redirect your efforts towards those site owners to see if you can recover some of the money,‚Äù they added. zkLend responded to the message by asking the hacker to ‚ÄúReturn all the funds left in your wallets‚Äù to the zkLend wallet address. However, according to Etherscan, another 25 Ether was then sent to a wallet listed as Chainflip1. Earlier, another user warned the exploiter about the error, telling them, ‚Äúdon‚Äôt celebrate,‚Äù because all the funds were sent to the scam Tornado Cash URL. ‚ÄúIt is so devastating. Everything gone with one wrong website,‚Äù the hacker replied. Another user warned the zkLend exploiter about the mistake, but it was too late. Source: Etherscan How zkLend was exploited for $9.6 million zkLend suffered an empty market exploit on Feb. 11 when an attacker used a small deposit and flash loans to inflate the lending accumulator, according to the protocol‚Äôs Feb. 14 post-mortem. The hacker then repeatedly deposited and withdrew funds, exploiting rounding errors that became significant due to the inflated accumulator. The attacker bridged the stolen funds to Ethereum and later failed to launder them through Railgun after protocol policies returned them to the original address. Following the exploit, zkLend proposed the hacker could keep 10% of the funds as a bounty and offered to release the culprit from legal liability and scrutiny from law enforcement if the remaining Ether was returned. Related: DeFi protocol SIR.trading loses entire $355K TVL in ‚Äòworst news‚Äô possible The offer deadline of Feb. 14 passed with no public response from either party. In a Feb. 19 update to X, zkLend said it was now offering a $500,000 bounty for any verifiable information that could lead to the hacker being arrested and the funds recovered. Losses to crypto scams, exploits and hacks totaled over $33 million, according to blockchain security firm CertiK, but dropped to $28 million after decentralized exchange aggregator 1inch successfully recovered its stolen funds . Losses to crypto scams, exploits and hacks totaled nearly $1.53 billion in February . The $1.4 billion Feb. 21 attack on Bybit by North Korea‚Äôs Lazarus Group made up the lion‚Äôs share and took the title for largest crypto hack ever, doubling the $650 million Ronin bridge hack in March 2022. Magazine: Lazarus Group‚Äôs favorite exploit revealed ‚Äî Crypto hacks analysis

title: Bitcoin dominates as crypto market sees $226M inflow
body: After a grueling period of record outflows, the digital asset market is showing signs of life. Last week, digital asset investment products attracted a substantial $226 million in inflows, marking nine consecutive trading days of positive sentiment and fueling cautious optimism among investors, according to a CoinShares report. This turnaround follows a particularly rough patch, though a minor setback occurred on Friday, with $74 million exiting the market, likely spooked by unexpectedly high US core personal consumption expenditure (PCE) data that could influence the Federal Reserve‚Äôs interest rate decisions. Bitcoin (BTC) remains the undisputed king of crypto assets, pulling in a commanding $195 million in inflows. This cements its position as the go-to digital asset for institutional investors seeking exposure to the crypto market. Interestingly, short-Bitcoin products experienced their fourth consecutive week of outflows, totaling $2.5 million, suggesting that bearish sentiment towards Bitcoin is waning as long-term optimism takes hold. Despite this recent resurgence, total assets under management (AUM) for global Bitcoin exchange-traded products (ETPs) have fallen to $114 billion, the lowest since shortly after the US presidential election. This figure suggests that there is still progress to be made. Perhaps the most encouraging sign is the altcoin market finally breaking its losing streak. Altcoins collectively secured $33 million in inflows, a welcome change after four consecutive weeks of outflows totaling a staggering $1.7 billion. Leading this altcoin resurgence were: Ethereum (ETH): $14.5 million Solana (SOL): $7.8 million XRP: $4.8 million Sui (SUI): $4.0 million This marks the first week in over a month that altcoins have seen positive flows, indicating renewed investor confidence in Layer-1 ecosystems and payment-focused tokens. Across the Globe: Where is the Crypto Money Flowing? The positive trend was not confined to a single region; major players across the globe contributed to the inflows: United States: $204 million Switzerland: $14.7 million Germany: $9.2 million Minor outflows were registered in: Hong Kong: $2.1 million Brazil: $1.3 million Navigating macroeconomic uncertainty The recent inflows offer a glimmer of hope that investor sentiment is turning cautiously optimistic. However, macroeconomic headwinds, particularly inflation data and Federal Reserve policy, continue to cast a shadow over the short-term outlook. If this positive momentum can be sustained, altcoins could extend their recovery, and Bitcoin could establish a stable position above current levels. A sustained recovery would indicate the continued strength of institutional interest in the overall digital asset class. The post Bitcoin dominates as crypto market sees $226M inflow appeared first on Invezz

title: Ethereum Price Faces a Tough Test‚ÄîCan It Clear the Hurdle?
body: Ethereum price started another decline and traded below the $1,850 level. ETH is now consolidating and facing key hurdles near the $1,850 level. Ethereum struggled to continue higher above the $1,980 resistance level. The price is trading below $1,860 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. There was a break above a connecting bearish trend line with resistance at $1,810 on the hourly chart of ETH/USD (data feed via Kraken). The pair must clear the $1,850 and $1,880 resistance levels to start a decent increase. Ethereum Price Attempts Recovery Ethereum price failed to continue higher above $2,050 and started another decline, like Bitcoin . ETH declined below the $1,880 and $1,850 support levels. It tested the $1,765 zone. A low was formed at $1,767 and the price recently started a short-term recovery wave . The price climbed above the $1,800 resistance. There was a move above the 23.6% Fib retracement level of the downward move from the $2,033 swing high to the $1,767 low. There was also a break above a connecting bearish trend line with resistance at $1,810 on the hourly chart of ETH/USD. Ethereum price is now trading below $1,860 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. On the upside, the price seems to be facing hurdles near the $1,850 level. The next key resistance is near the $1,860 level. The first major resistance is near the $1,900 level and the 50% Fib retracement level of the downward move from the $2,033 swing high to the $1,767 low. A clear move above the $1,900 resistance might send the price toward the $2,000 resistance. An upside break above the $2,000 resistance might call for more gains in the coming sessions. In the stated case, Ether could rise toward the $2,050 resistance zone or even $2,120 in the near term. Another Decline In ETH? If Ethereum fails to clear the $1,850 resistance, it could start another decline. Initial support on the downside is near the $1,800 level. The first major support sits near the $1,780 zone. A clear move below the $1,780 support might push the price toward the $1,765 support. Any more losses might send the price toward the $1,710 support level in the near term. The next key support sits at $1,665. Technical Indicators Hourly MACD ‚Äì The MACD for ETH/USD is losing momentum in the bearish zone. Hourly RSI ‚Äì The RSI for ETH/USD is now above the 50 zone. title: Saylor‚Äôs Strategy Adds $1.9 Billion Worth Of Bitcoin To Growing Portfolio
body: Michael Saylor‚Äôs firm, Strategy (previously known as MicroStrategy), announced a new Bitcoin (BTC) buy on Monday, March 31st of a significant $1.9 billion in BTC. This comes despite the market‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency‚Äôs recent challenges, having plummeted 25% from its all-time high in January of this year. Interestingly, this latest acquisition marks the largest in terms of tokens for Strategy in 2025. Strategy Boosts Bitcoin Holdings To $43.4 Billion Since late October, Strategy has engaged in a series of nearly weekly purchases, bringing its total Bitcoin holdings to approximately $43.4 billion. Remarkably, this amount represents about 2.5% of the total 21 million Bitcoin that will ever be issued. According to a recent filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), Strategy acquired 22,048 Bitcoin at an average price of roughly $86,969 each between March 24 and March 30. Related Reading: Ethereum Price Confirms Breakout From Ascending Triangle, Target Set At $7,800 This purchase is part of a larger trend for the company, which has actively sought to bolster its Bitcoin reserves. In the first quarter alone, Strategy spent approximately $7.79 billion on Bitcoin, with the next largest acquisition earlier this year totaling 20,356 Bitcoin, announced on February 24. To finance this latest purchase, Strategy utilized proceeds raised through its at-the-market sales program for common shares, as well as offerings of preferred shares. This financing approach has proven successful, as the common shares of Strategy have surged nearly 2,200% since Saylor began investing the company‚Äôs cash into Bitcoin in 2020. During the same timeframe, Bitcoin itself has seen an increase of over 600%. Market Indicators Signal Potential BTC Recovery Bitcoin, on the other hand, is currently attempting to consolidate above the critical support level of $80,000 after experiencing a decline toward $76,000 for the first time since November 2024. Despite this recent drop, indicators suggest potential for further price recovery in the near term. Recent research from analysis firm CryptoQuant highlights the significance of Binance‚Äôs spot trading volume in the cryptocurrency market. Notably, in early 2025, when Binance‚Äôs volume surpassed that of all other exchanges combined, Bitcoin was experiencing a surge toward new all-time highs of $109,000. The Binance vs. Other Exchanges BTC Spot Volume Delta indicator has turned positive again, indicating that Binance‚Äôs trading volume is consistently outpacing that of its competitors. Related Reading: Ethereum To $20K? Investor Says Real-World Adoption Holds The Key The last time this trend was observed, BTC was trading around $42,000 before climbing to $73,000. Historically, periods of heightened Binance volume have been associated with bullish market sentiment, suggesting that traders may view Binance‚Äôs dominance as a positive signal for Bitcoin‚Äôs price trajectory. It is also worth noting that at the beginning of 2024, Binance‚Äôs volume was reported to be 19 times greater than Coinbase‚Äôs. Although this disparity has decreased to eight times, it still highlights Binance‚Äôs significant leadership in the market. According to CryptoQuant‚Äôs analysis, the ongoing strength of Binance as a trading platform will likely play a crucial role in shaping market dynamics as Bitcoin seeks to regain its footing above the $80,000 mark. title: Trump‚Äôs Crypto Chaos: Ventures Complicate Cryptocurrency Regulation Efforts
body: Donald Trump‚Äôs foray into the cryptocurrency realm has taken an unexpected turn, creating ripples that extend far beyond the market hype. His family‚Äôs increasing involvement in crypto ventures, including memecoins and stablecoins, is now being cited as a significant complicating factor in the already intricate landscape of crypto regulation . This unexpected intersection of celebrity, politics, and digital assets is raising eyebrows and creating legislative hurdles on Capitol Hill. Is Trump‚Äôs crypto gamble about to reshape the future of digital currency laws? Trump‚Äôs Crypto Ventures Cast Shadow on Crypto Legislation Rep. French Hill (R-AR), a key figure in bipartisan efforts to establish clear crypto legislation , has openly voiced concerns about the challenges posed by Trump‚Äôs burgeoning crypto portfolio. According to a recent report by Decrypt, Hill stated that these ventures are muddying the waters when it comes to achieving consensus on Capitol Hill. This couldn‚Äôt come at a more critical time, especially with pivotal bills like the STABLE Act poised to be reviewed by Congress this week. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of why Trump‚Äôs crypto activities are causing legislative headaches: Conflict of Interest Concerns: With Trump‚Äôs family directly benefiting from crypto ventures, questions arise about potential conflicts of interest when shaping cryptocurrency policy . Critics argue that personal financial gains could influence political decision-making, undermining the impartiality needed for effective regulation. Erosion of Bipartisan Support: The already fragile bipartisan consensus on crypto regulation is further strained. Democrats, like Sen. Elizabeth Warren, have been vocal in their criticism, labeling Trump‚Äôs crypto ventures a ‚Äúgrift.‚Äù This sharp rhetoric can deepen partisan divides and make finding common ground on complex issues like the STABLE Act even harder. Increased Scrutiny and Delays: The controversy surrounding Trump crypto ventures is likely to lead to increased scrutiny of any crypto-related bills. Lawmakers might become more cautious, potentially delaying the progress of crucial legislation as they navigate the ethical and political implications of regulating an industry so closely tied to a prominent political figure. The STABLE Act and the Shadow of Trump Crypto The timing of this controversy is particularly sensitive. The STABLE Act, a significant piece of proposed crypto legislation aimed at clarifying the regulatory framework for stablecoins, is heading to Congress this week. This act, designed to bring much-needed clarity to the stablecoin market, now faces an uphill battle. The shadow of Trump crypto ventures looms large, potentially diverting attention and political capital away from the bill‚Äôs core objectives. What is the STABLE Act? The STABLE Act, or the ‚ÄúStablecoin Transparency of Reserves and Uniform Law Enforcement Act,‚Äù seeks to: Feature Description Regulatory Clarity Establishes a clear federal regulatory framework for stablecoins, addressing concerns about their reserves and operational transparency. Consumer Protection Aims to protect consumers by ensuring stablecoin issuers maintain adequate reserves and comply with anti-money laundering (AML) and know-your-customer (KYC) regulations. Financial Stability Seeks to mitigate potential risks to the financial system posed by the growing stablecoin market, especially in light of their increasing integration with traditional finance. The act‚Äôs progress is crucial for the future of stablecoins and the broader crypto market. However, the political storm stirred by Trump crypto could make it harder to achieve the bipartisan support needed for its passage. Navigating the Complex Web of Cryptocurrency Policy The situation highlights the broader challenges in formulating effective cryptocurrency policy . The rapid evolution of the crypto market, coupled with the increasing involvement of public figures, demands a nuanced and adaptable regulatory approach. Here are some key considerations for navigating this complex web: Balancing Innovation and Regulation: The goal is to foster innovation in the crypto space while simultaneously mitigating risks and protecting consumers. Overly stringent regulations could stifle growth, while lax oversight could lead to instability and illicit activities. Addressing Conflicts of Interest: Clear ethical guidelines are needed to address potential conflicts of interest when politicians or their families are involved in the crypto industry. Transparency and recusal mechanisms may be necessary to maintain public trust. Promoting Bipartisan Cooperation: Given the polarized political climate, fostering bipartisan cooperation is crucial for effective crypto legislation . Finding common ground on consumer protection, financial stability, and national security concerns can pave the way for meaningful progress. Global Coordination: Cryptocurrencies operate globally, making international regulatory coordination essential. Harmonizing regulations across jurisdictions can prevent regulatory arbitrage and ensure a level playing field. The Road Ahead for Crypto Regulation: Challenges and Opportunities Trump‚Äôs entry into the crypto world has undeniably thrown a curveball into the ongoing efforts to regulate digital assets. While his ventures present unique challenges, they also underscore the growing mainstream acceptance of cryptocurrencies. This moment could be a catalyst for more serious and comprehensive discussions about the future of crypto regulation . The challenge now lies in navigating the political complexities and focusing on creating a regulatory framework that is both robust and conducive to innovation. Ultimately, the unfolding situation with Trump crypto and the STABLE Act serves as a stark reminder of the intricate interplay between politics, finance, and technology in the digital age. The coming weeks will be critical in determining how these forces shape the future of cryptocurrency regulation and the broader digital economy. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Revolutionizing Biotech: Isomorphic Labs Secures Massive $600M for AI Drug Discovery
body: In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency and tech investments, breakthroughs in artificial intelligence (AI) are constantly making headlines. But AI‚Äôs transformative power isn‚Äôt limited to the digital realm. Imagine AI revolutionizing healthcare, specifically drug discovery ‚Äì a field ripe for innovation. That‚Äôs precisely what Alphabet‚Äôs Isomorphic Labs is doing, and their recent $600 million funding round is sending shockwaves through the biotech and tech investment communities. Let‚Äôs dive into this exciting development and explore what it means for the future of medicine and investment landscapes alike. Massive $600M Boost for AI Drug Discovery Isomorphic Labs, spun out from Google‚Äôs DeepMind in 2021, has just announced a colossal $600 million funding round. This marks the first time the AI-driven drug discovery platform has sought external capital, signaling a significant acceleration in its mission. The round was spearheaded by Thrive Capital, a prominent investment firm known for backing disruptive technologies, with participation from GV (Google Ventures) and Alphabet itself. This substantial financial injection underscores the immense potential investors see in Isomorphic Labs‚Äô approach to drug development. Why Isomorphic Labs is a Game Changer in Biotech Investment What makes Isomorphic Labs so compelling for investors, and why should the crypto-savvy audience pay attention? It boils down to a few key factors: DeepMind Pedigree: Born from DeepMind, the AI powerhouse behind AlphaGo and AlphaFold, Isomorphic Labs inherits cutting-edge AI expertise. This isn‚Äôt just another biotech startup; it‚Äôs backed by some of the brightest minds in AI. AlphaFold Advantage: Isomorphic Labs leverages DeepMind‚Äôs groundbreaking AlphaFold model, which accurately predicts protein structures. Proteins are the building blocks of life and understanding their structure is crucial for drug design. AlphaFold dramatically accelerates this process, a capability that traditional methods struggle to match. Strategic Partnerships: Even before this funding round, Isomorphic Labs had already secured significant partnerships with pharmaceutical giants like Eli Lilly and Novartis. These collaborations, potentially worth up to $3 billion in milestone payments, validate Isomorphic Labs‚Äô technology and market potential. Addressing a Critical Need: Traditional drug discovery is slow, expensive, and has a high failure rate. AI-powered approaches like Isomorphic Labs offer the promise of faster, more efficient, and more targeted drug development, addressing a massive global need. For those in the crypto world accustomed to investing in disruptive technologies, Isomorphic Labs represents a similar paradigm shift in the biotech sector. It‚Äôs an investment in the future of healthcare, powered by AI. Thrive Capital and the Future of Biotech Investment Thrive Capital‚Äôs leadership in this funding round is noteworthy. They are known for identifying and backing companies that are not just innovative but also have the potential to reshape industries. Their investment in Isomorphic Labs signals a strong belief in the transformative power of AI in biotech and drug discovery. This move could encourage further venture capital flowing into AI-driven biotech startups, mirroring the investment trends seen in other AI-heavy sectors. For investors tracking where smart money is going, Thrive Capital‚Äôs bet on Isomorphic Labs is a clear indicator of a burgeoning trend in biotech investment . The Power of AlphaFold in AI Drug Discovery At the heart of Isomorphic Labs‚Äô platform is AlphaFold. But what exactly is AlphaFold, and why is it so revolutionary for AI drug discovery ? Feature Traditional Drug Discovery AI Drug Discovery with AlphaFold Protein Structure Prediction Slow, expensive lab experiments (e.g., X-ray crystallography) Rapid, accurate predictions using AI algorithms Drug Design Speed Years, often decades Potentially significantly faster, months to years Cost Billions of dollars per drug Aims to reduce costs through efficiency Success Rate Low, high failure rate in clinical trials Hopes to improve success rates by targeting drug design AlphaFold‚Äôs ability to accurately predict protein structures is a monumental leap forward. It allows researchers to understand disease mechanisms at a molecular level and design drugs that precisely target those mechanisms. This precision medicine approach is the future of healthcare, and Isomorphic Labs is at the forefront of this revolution. Demis Hassabis and the Vision for Isomorphic Labs Founded by DeepMind co-founder Demis Hassabis, Isomorphic Labs is driven by a clear vision: to reimagine drug discovery through the power of AI. Hassabis, a neuroscientist turned AI pioneer (and Nobel laureate along with DeepMind researcher John Jumper for their work on AlphaFold), brings a unique blend of scientific rigor and technological innovation to the company. His leadership and the team‚Äôs expertise are crucial factors in Isomorphic Labs‚Äô potential to transform the pharmaceutical industry. Hassabis‚Äôs statement that the funding will help hire top research scientists underscores the company‚Äôs commitment to attracting the best talent to further accelerate their AI drug discovery engine. Navigating the Challenges and Future of AI in Biotech While the potential of AI in drug discovery is immense, challenges remain. These include: Data Availability and Quality: AI models require vast amounts of high-quality data to train effectively. Ensuring data privacy and accessibility within the biotech industry is crucial. Regulatory Hurdles: AI-designed drugs will still need to navigate rigorous regulatory processes. Clear guidelines and frameworks for AI in drug development are needed. Ethical Considerations: As AI plays a greater role in healthcare, ethical considerations around access, bias, and algorithmic transparency must be addressed. Despite these challenges, the momentum behind Isomorphic Labs and the broader field of AI-powered biotech is undeniable. The $600 million funding round is not just a financial milestone; it‚Äôs a powerful signal that AI is poised to revolutionize drug discovery and reshape the future of healthcare. Conclusion: A Revolutionary Leap for Healthcare and Investment Isomorphic Labs‚Äô $600 million funding round is more than just another tech investment story. It‚Äôs a pivotal moment in the convergence of AI and biotechnology, promising to accelerate drug discovery and potentially transform how we treat diseases. For those watching the cryptocurrency and tech investment space, this development highlights the expanding reach of AI and its potential to disrupt even traditionally slow-moving industries like pharmaceuticals. Keep an eye on Isomorphic Labs ‚Äì they are likely to be at the forefront of a healthcare revolution powered by artificial intelligence. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: zkLend hacker loses all 2,930 stolen ETH to TornadoCash phishing scam
body: The zkLend exploiter lost all 2,930 ETH in a phishing scam while trying to launder the stolen money using what they thought was Tornado Cash. According to a Mar. 31 post on X by Consensys-backed De.Fi Antivirus Web3, the attacker mistakenly deposited the stolen funds into a fake Tornado Cash website, resulting in an immediate loss. On-chain data shows that after realizing the mistake, the hacker sent a desperate message to zkLend‚Äôs deployer address, admitting their blunder. ‚ÄúI tried to move funds to Tornado, but I used a phishing website, and all the funds have been lost. I am devastated,‚Äù the hacker wrote. They went on to apologize for the attack and urged zkLend to focus its recovery efforts on the phishing scam operators. üö®BREAKING: ZKLEND HACKER GOT REKTüö® 2,930 $ETH maliciously grabbed in the zkLend hack were mistakenly deposited to a copycat website of Tornado Cash In the end, the hacker addresses the case to the zkLend deployer as they no longer have stolen assets pic.twitter.com/J9io6vvKYl ‚Äî De.Fi Antivirus Web3 üõ°Ô∏è (@De_FiSecurity) March 31, 2025 More than $9.6 million in Ethereum ( ETH ) was stolen in the zkLend exploit , which took place on Feb. 12 . In an attempt to engage in negotiations, the Starknet-based lending protocol offered the hacker a 10% reward in exchange for returning the remaining funds by Feb. 14. You might also like: DeFi protocol SIR.trading loses entire $355K TVL following exploit ZkLend was forced to escalate the matter to law enforcement because the hacker ignored the deadline. The platform announced that it had enlisted security experts from the Starknet Foundation, StarkWare, and Binance Security to locate and recover the funds. But now that the stolen ETH has been lost to a phishing scam, things seem to have taken a surprising turn. The zkLend attack is part of a growing trend of high-profile cryptocurrency exploits. According to Immunefi‚Äôs Q1 2025 report , the first three months of 2025 saw the worst quarter for crypto security breaches in history, with hackers stealing $1.64 billion. The zkLend hack was the fifth-largest exploit of the quarter. Decentralized finance protocols lost $106.8 million across 38 incidents, with Ethereum and BNB ( BNB ) Chain being the most targeted networks. While DeFi suffered multiple attacks , centralized finance platforms saw just two incidents, but those resulted in a staggering $1.5 billion in losses. Read more: Coinbase Institutional open-sources MPC library to promote industry-wide security

title: Shocking AI Receipts: ChatGPT 4o‚Äôs Image Generator Unleashes Deepfake Fraud Threat
body: In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency and digital finance, trust is paramount. But what happens when the very images we rely on for verification can no longer be trusted? OpenAI‚Äôs latest marvel, the ChatGPT 4o model, has unveiled a stunningly realistic AI image generator that‚Äôs raising eyebrows and sparking serious concerns. While designed to enhance creative possibilities, this powerful tool is proving to be exceptionally adept at creating incredibly convincing fake receipts . This development adds a potent new weapon to the arsenal of those seeking to exploit the digital realm, potentially ushering in a new era of sophisticated AI fraud and deepfakes . The Dawn of Realistic AI-Generated Receipts: How Good is ChatGPT 4o? This month marked the arrival of ChatGPT 4o, boasting a significantly improved AI image generator capable of embedding text within images with unprecedented realism. Social media quickly buzzed with demonstrations of its capabilities, but one particular application caught the attention of many: the generation of fake receipts . Deedy Das, a prominent VC and social media figure, showcased on X a fabricated receipt for a well-known San Francisco steakhouse, created entirely using ChatGPT 4o. His post highlighted a stark reality: ‚ÄúYou can use 4o to generate fake receipts. There are too many real world verification flows that rely on ‚Äòreal images‚Äô as proof. That era is over.‚Äù ChatGPT 4o can generate receipts now. You can use 4o to generate fake receipts. There are too many real world verification flows that rely on ‚Äúreal images‚Äù as proof. That era is over. pic.twitter.com/9FORS1PWsb ‚Äî Deedy (@deedydas) March 29, 2025 Others were quick to experiment, achieving similarly impressive results. Michael Gofman even refined the output, adding realistic food and drink stains to enhance the authenticity of his fake receipt , demonstrating the ease with which these AI-generated images can be manipulated to appear even more genuine. I think in the original image the letters are too perfect and they don‚Äôt bend with the paper. They look like hovering above the paper. Here is my attempt to make it more realistic. Let me know what you think. pic.twitter.com/EixRSHubeY ‚Äî Michael Gofman (@michaelgofman) March 29, 2025 Bitcoin World‚Äôs own investigation uncovered an even more convincing example originating from France, where a LinkedIn user showcased a crumpled, AI-generated receipt for a local restaurant chain. Intrigued, we put ChatGPT 4o to the test, successfully generating a fake receipt for an Applebee‚Äôs in San Francisco. However, our initial attempt wasn‚Äôt flawless. Subtle giveaways, such as the use of a comma instead of a period in the total and basic math errors, hinted at its artificial origin. While Large Language Models (LLMs) still grapple with arithmetic precision, these imperfections are easily rectified. A fraudster could swiftly correct these minor discrepancies using readily available photo editing software or by refining their prompts to the AI image generator . The Alarming Potential for AI Fraud: What are the Risks? The ease with which realistic fake receipts can now be generated presents significant opportunities for AI fraud . Imagine the implications: Expense Reimbursement Scams: Bad actors could effortlessly create fake receipts to claim reimbursements for fictitious expenses, targeting businesses and organizations. Insurance Fraud: Altered or entirely fabricated receipts could be used to inflate insurance claims, defrauding insurance companies. Tax Evasion: Fake receipts could be employed to create false records for tax deductions or to mask illicit transactions. E-commerce Scams: Fraudulent sellers could generate fake receipts to deceive buyers into believing items have been shipped or transactions completed. The potential for misuse is vast, and the implications for digital trust are profound. As verification processes increasingly rely on digital images, the ability to easily fabricate them undermines the integrity of these systems. OpenAI‚Äôs Response: Creative Freedom vs. Responsible AI Development In response to Bitcoin World‚Äôs inquiries, OpenAI spokesperson Taya Christianson stated that all images generated by ChatGPT include metadata indicating their AI origin. She added that OpenAI actively ‚Äútakes action‚Äù against users violating its usage policies and is committed to ‚Äúalways learning‚Äù from real-world applications and user feedback. When questioned about why ChatGPT permits the generation of fake receipts in the first place, particularly given OpenAI‚Äôs policies against fraud, Christianson explained that their ‚Äúgoal is to give users as much creative freedom as possible.‚Äù She suggested that AI-generated receipts could have legitimate, non-fraudulent applications, such as ‚Äúteaching people about financial literacy,‚Äù creating original art, and developing product advertisements. Navigating the Deepfake Era: Can We Still Trust Digital Images? The rise of sophisticated AI image generators like ChatGPT 4o forces us to confront a critical question: In a world where digital images can be so easily manipulated, can we still rely on them as proof? The ability to create convincing deepfakes , including fake receipts , challenges the very foundation of digital verification. While OpenAI emphasizes creative freedom and responsible use, the potential for malicious exploitation is undeniable. As technology advances, developing robust methods for detecting and mitigating AI fraud and deepfakes becomes increasingly crucial to maintaining trust in the digital age. To learn more about the latest AI fraud detection trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI security features.

title: North Korean crypto hackers are getting more sophisticated
body: Crypto firm Paradigm warns in a report titled ‚ÄúDemystifying the North Korean Threat‚Äù that North Korean cyberwarfare attacks on the cryptocurrency industry are growing in sophistication, and the number of groups involved in such criminal activity is increasing. Over the years, North Korea has been tied to high-profile cyberattacks on cryptocurrency exchanges, with stolen money believed to be used to finance the country‚Äôs military and nuclear‚ÄÇprograms. The United Nations estimated North Korea stole about $3 billion in crypto hacks from 2017 to 2023. However, in just 2024 and 2025 alone, they have already plundered a record $1.7 billion from two of the largest exchanges, WazirX and Bybit. Hackers use fake job offers to steal crypto, putting millions of users at risk There are several factions of North Korean hackers, each specializing in different kinds of cyberattacks. The most infamous one is the Lazarus Group, which has a history of targeting financial institutions and digital asset exchanges. Other groups, such as AppleJeus , Dangerous Password, and Spinout, use different methods (e.g., phishing attacks, fake job offers, malware masquerading as genuine software). The most shocking attack to date took place in February 2025, when crypto exchange Bybit was hacked for $1.5 billion ‚Äî the largest cryptocurrency hack to date. While it was first considered to be a phishing scheme, an in-depth investigation revealed that the exploit was based on a much more advanced strategy. The hackers, from North Korea‚Äôs Reconnaissance General Bureau, had stealthily compromised Safe{Wallet}, a digital wallet system used by many Bybit users, rather than launching an attack directly against the exchange. They infiltrated a backdoor into the software, letting them siphon cash without immediately being noticed. This method was far more sophisticated. Rather than targeting exchanges, it targeted the infrastructure supporting crypto exchanges. Once they steal the cryptocurrency, the hackers launder it and evade detection using off-the-shelf, well-established techniques. They first divide the loot into smaller amounts, pass them through hundreds of digital wallets, and eventually turn them into Bitcoin (BTC). This tactic makes it harder for authorities to trace the money. According to the security firm Chainalysis, Lazarus Group tends to hold stolen money for months, years, and even before spending it, maximizing its chances of avoiding detection. The FBI has identified three alleged members of the Lazarus Group and accused them of cybercrimes. In February 2021, the US Justice Department indicted two of those members for involvement in global cybercrimes. Yet, despite such efforts, North Korean hackers and cybercriminals have continued to adapt and find new methods for interfering with financial systems. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? title: Scam Warning: Is Gemini Filing for Bankruptcy? Phishing Email Spreads Panic
body: The post Scam Warning: Is Gemini Filing for Bankruptcy? Phishing Email Spreads Panic appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News A warning is making the rounds in the crypto community as scam emails claiming that Gemini has filed for bankruptcy are being sent out. The fraudulent message urges recipients to protect their funds by withdrawing to an ‚ÄúExodus wallet,‚Äù even providing a fake seed phrase to trick users. Red Flags to Watch Out For: The scam email, which appears to come from a suspicious address, falsely claims that a security breach in late 2024 compromised $1.2 billion in cold storage reserves. It falsely states that, due to operational and regulatory hurdles, Gemini is filing for bankruptcy protection. ‚ÄúWe are writing to inform you that, as of March 31, 202%, Gemini Trust Company, LLC has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the United States Bankruptcy Court. This step follows a significant financial setback caused by a security broach at a third-party custodial service we relied on, resulting in substantial losses. We regret the impact this has on our users and are committed to helping you secure your assets during this process,‚Äù the fake email read. Many people have reported receiving similar emails, causing panic and confusion‚Äîjust in time for April 1st, making it feel like an elaborate April Fools‚Äô joke. But this isn‚Äôt a joke. It‚Äôs a scam designed to steal your crypto. Crypto experts and community members are urging everyone to stay calm, double-check any communications from official sources, and never click on links or provide personal information in suspicious emails.

body: The post XRP Breakout Alert: Bullish Divergence Hints Stronger Bounce To $2.30 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News After hitting a low of $2.03, XRP has finally bounced back to the $2.10 level, showing a gain of more than 1%. However, the cryptocurrency has struggled over the past week, closing in the red during six of the last seven daily trading sessions. This weakness comes amid a broader slump in the crypto market, where falling prices and investor uncertainty have put pressure on most digital assets. Currently, XRP‚Äôs price chart reveals a tug-of-war between bearish and bullish signals across different timeframes. On the 3-day chart, a strong bearish divergence remains active. This shows that although XRP‚Äôs price has been moving, the momentum behind those moves is not as strong as it appears. The situation has not changed significantly in the past day, suggesting that bearish pressure is still prevalent. Bullish Divergence Emerging on the 8-Hour Chart In contrast, the 8-hour chart shows signs of a bullish divergence. While XRP‚Äôs price has been posting lower lows, the Relative Strength Index (RSI)‚Äîa key momentum indicator‚Äîhas been forming higher lows. This pattern suggests that despite the price declines, underlying momentum is strengthening. A stronger bounce in the RSI over the next day would provide additional confirmation of this potential reversal. For the short term, sideways price action is expected, with a slight bullish bias. Historical patterns suggest that such setups often lead to either modest upward moves followed by consolidation or, in favorable conditions, more significant bullish rallies. XRP‚Äôs price movements remain closely tied to Bitcoin and the broader cryptocurrency market. Unless Bitcoin experiences a substantial bullish breakout, XRP‚Äôs potential for a major price surge appears limited in the near term. Key support levels are identified between $1.95 and $2.05, where buying interest is likely to emerge if the price dips. Resistance is expected between $2.24 and $2.30, a zone where selling pressure tends to intensify.

title: Trump will ease emission standards for automakers
body: Former President Donald Trump has announced he wants to bring back less stringent automobile emissions standards, effectively undoing the tougher rules established by former President Joe Biden. Speaking in the Oval Office on Monday, Trump said the current regulations place an unfair burden on automakers and pledged to revisit the policy adopted during his first term in office. Trump revealed he discussed the matter with John Elkann, chairman of Stellantis NV, which owns Chrysler. During their meeting, the two talked about environmental regulations and how they affect car manufacturing. Trump told reporters the country will ‚Äúprobably‚Äù return to the emission levels applied in 2020. He said that the discussion revolved around. ‚Äúsome of the problems they have with the environment, which we‚Äôre going to clean up.‚Äù Trump announces going back to 2020 emission standards. Source: Real America‚Äôs Voice The president argued that Biden‚Äôs more rigorous standards do not ‚Äúmean a damn bit of difference for the environment‚Äù yet make car production very difficult. Under the previous policy favored by Trump, greenhouse gas pollution from passenger vehicles would be capped at 204 grams per mile for cars and 284 grams per mile for light trucks. That 2020 baseline was set to continue under an EPA plan proposed in Trump‚Äôs first term, but Biden later replaced it with rules that require 170 grams of carbon dioxide per mile in 2027 and only 85 grams per mile in 2032. Automakers have been pressed to expand their electric vehicle (EV) offerings under Biden‚Äôs standards. Trump has often criticized that approach, calling it an EV mandate because of how it forces manufacturers to focus on zero-emission models to meet the stricter limits. Environmental groups counter that major cuts in greenhouse gas pollution are needed to slow global warming, and they note the transportation sector remains the biggest source of these emissions in the United States. Trump says his approach is more manageable for carmakers while being environmentally friendly On Monday, Trump defended his preferred approach as both environmentally friendly and manageable for industry. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre going to be bringing it back to a standard that is a very good environmental standard, but it makes it possible to build a car,‚Äù he said. He emphasized that 2020‚Äôs requirements were already robust enough without threatening vehicle production. Representatives from the Environmental Protection Agency have yet to comment. Trump has also instructed the agency to scrap what he calls the ‚Äúelectric vehicle mandate,‚Äù and the EPA has begun rolling back various environmental measures tied to Biden-era efforts. If Trump follows through, the return to these weaker emission rules would mark a significant shift away from the stricter guidelines meant to curb global warming. title: Analyst Spots Key Ethereum Resistance Levels While RSI Hints At Bullish Divergence
body: In an X post shared today, acclaimed cryptocurrency analyst Ali Martinez identified two key resistance levels that Ethereum (ETH) must reclaim to confirm a bullish trend reversal. Additionally, ETH is showing signs of bullish divergence on the daily chart, raising optimism among holders that a rally may be closer than expected. Ethereum Must Overcome These Levels For Further Upside Unlike rival cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Solana (SOL), and XRP, ETH‚Äôs recent price action has disappointed most of its holders. The second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization is down 49.2% over the past year, in stark contrast to BTC‚Äôs 18.5% gain over the same period. Related Reading: Is Ethereum Breaking Free from the Bear Trap? Analysts Weigh In Sharing the following daily chart, Martinez highlighted two critical resistance levels that ETH must surpass to reverse its price trajectory. The analyst stated: Ethereum $ETH needs to reclaim $2,100, and more decisively, $2,300, to confirm a bullish trend reversal. These are the levels to watch! To recall, ETH last traded at the $2,100 level earlier this month on March 9. Interestingly, the digital asset also plunged to as low as $1,754 on the same day, its lowest price in more than a year. After reclaiming $2,100, ETH will need to overcome the more significant $2,300 resistance level. A clear breakout above $2,300 could signal renewed bullish momentum. Meanwhile, altcoin analyst @altcoinrookie shared a bearish forecast for Ethereum, predicting that ETH will dip to $1,200 by June 2025 before reaching new all-time highs (ATHs). ETH Showing Signs Of Bullish Divergence While these analyses suggest short- to mid-term challenges for ETH, crypto trader Merlijn The Trade provided a more optimistic outlook. The analyst shared the following ETH daily chart, noting that the asset is displaying bullish divergence. For the uninitiated, the RSI is a momentum indicator that helps traders and investors to determine when the underlying asset may be overbought or oversold. RSI bullish divergence occurs when the RSI forms higher lows while the price forms lower lows, indicating weakening selling pressure and a potential trend reversal to the upside. Related Reading: Ethereum Gained 160% The Last Time This On-Chain Indicator Flashed ‚Äì Will ETH Soar Again? The trader further pointed out that although ETH‚Äôs price continues to make lower lows, its daily RSI is forming a contrasting trend. Merlijn also shared a two-week ETH price chart, highlighting how Ethereum has historically rebounded from a critical support level since early 2024, often posting significant returns after each bounce. That said, rising ETH reserves on crypto exchanges remain a concern, potentially extending ETH‚Äôs price suppression. At press time, ETH trades at $1,840, up 2.1% in the past 24 hours.
